    • 构造器详细资料

      • DeviceNotificationHelper

        public DeviceNotificationHelper(AylaDevice device)
        Constructor
        参数:

    • 方法详细资料

      • getNotifications

        public java.util.Map<AylaDeviceNotification,java.util.List<AylaDeviceNotificationApp>> getNotifications()
        Returns a map of AylaDeviceNotifications to list of their respective AylaDeviceNotificationApps. These notifications are retrieved from the Cloud Service by calling deepFetchNotifications(DeviceNotificationHelperListener) and stored in this object.
        返回:
        the map of device notifications to their apps

      • appsForNotification

        public java.util.List<AylaDeviceNotificationApp> appsForNotification(AylaDeviceNotification notification)

      • setCustomMessage

        public void setCustomMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Call this method to set the custom message associated with the device notifications. Default is no message (null).
        参数:
        message - Custom message to set with all notifications created by this object

      • enableDeviceNotifications

        public void enableDeviceNotifications(AylaServiceApp.NotificationType notificationType,
                                      boolean enable,
                                      DeviceNotificationHelper.DeviceNotificationHelperListener listener)
        Method to set or clear notifications.
        参数:
        notificationType - email | sms | push
        enable - True to enable the notification, false to disable the notification
        listener - Listener to receive the completion event

      • initializeNewDeviceNotifications

        public void initializeNewDeviceNotifications(DeviceNotificationHelper.DeviceNotificationHelperListener listener)
        Creates the appropriate notifications for a new device. This method will check the AccountSettings to see what notifications should be set on the device, and sets them. The caller will be notified via the listener interface with a call to .agilelink.framework.DeviceNotificationHelper .DeviceNotificationHelperListener#newDeviceUpdated
        参数:
        listener - Listener to receive results when the operation is complete

      • deepFetchNotifications

        public void deepFetchNotifications(DeviceNotificationHelper.DeviceNotificationHelperListener listener)
        Fetches all notifications and apps for the device. When this method is finished, the listener's deviceStateComplete method will be called with the results.
        参数:
        listener - Listener to receive the completion event
